title: aDiyAr paDum iDar
sahitya:
aDiyAr paDum iDar aDiyODu aghanrODum vaDivElan tiruvaDiyai vaNangi vazhipaDum


anupallavi

  paDi idanil eDutta piravi adanai aDuttu iDai viDAmal toDarum innal uTriDum


caraNam    varuttamura manattai urutti varum kavalai viraivil maraindODa vENDumenru nADi
karuttinai cendUr kandan kazhalaDi tEDi nirutti nidam avan tiruppugazhai pADiDum
